dct:title: Miami-Dade Major Roads
dct:creator: Miami-Dade County

dct:description:
A line feature class of Miami-Dade County streets with seamless address ranges. Displays main roads including expressway ramps, expressways, highways, and major roads.

A line feature class of Miami-Dade County streets with seamless address ranges. This feature class (FC) is one of a set of FC's derived from our main Streets FC, which were created to display street information.
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/mdc_major_roads/{download,etl} && cd /data/mdc_major_roads

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# Create copy of geom dependency
pg_dump -d $POSTGRES_DB -U $POSTGRES_USER -p $POSTGRES_PORT -h postgis-ryanlr619lpfqzd2 -t mdc_streets | sed 's/mdc_streets/mdc_major_roads/g' | psql -d $POSTGRES_DB -U $POSTGRES_USER -p $POSTGRES_PORT -h postgis-ljdbztukphqn0glt

# subset as per custom parameters
psql -d $POSTGRES_DB -U $POSTGRES_USER -p $POSTGRES_PORT -h postgis-ljdbztukphqn0glt -c "
DELETE FROM mdc_major_roads
WHERE NOT (class in ('0','1','2','3'));
"
dcat:contactPoint: University of Miami Libraries, Frost Institute for Data Science and Computing
gdsc:label: streetid
gdsc:attributes: l_add_from;Start of the left address range;MDC;integer;
l_add_to;End of the left address range;MDC;integer;
r_add_from;Start of the right address range;MDC;integer;
r_add_to;End of the right address range;MDC;integer;

class;Road type classification       0 -- Expressway Ramp -- Access ramps to expressways only
  1 -- Expressway -- Limited access roadways
  2 -- Highway -- Non-Limited access highways examples: US 1, KROME AVE
  3 -- Major Road -- Major roads that serve a large volume of traffic;MDC;string;
from_to_imp;Length of street arc, or -1 if traffic is not allowed going form the begining of the arc to the end as it was digitized;MDC;double;
to_from_imp;Length of the street arc, or -1 if traffic is not allowed going form the end of the arc to the beginning  as it was digitized;MDC;string;
